docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Aug. 9 (AP) A labor crisis was apparently averted today by a Government agreement to grant salary increases to 200,000 state workers.

docs.snippet: THE only way to get to Cuba from within the Western Hemisphere, unless you have your own submarine, is by Cubana Airlines,  via Mexico City. This is a regularly scheduled airline that flies irregularly. You need a U.S. passport, stamped for travel in...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE only way to get to Cuba from within the Western Hemisphere, unless you have your own submarine, is by Cubana Airlines, via Mexico City. This is a regularly scheduled airline that flies irregularly. You need a U.S. passport, stamped for travel in Cuba; a letter from the U.S. Treasury, authorizing you to spend dollars for transportation, food and lodging; a Mexican transit permit, Cuban visa and plenty of patience.
docs.abstract: revs his visit and impressions of Castro revolution; illus; finds Castro builds 'new' Cuba and is followed by youth, mostly because they believe him but also because they fear consequences of disbelief; fears educ of 'hate and violence,' seen alien to Cuban nature

headline.main: Cuban Diary: Bringing Up Castro's 'New Man'; Cuban Diary (Cont.)
